briefTitle: Evaluation of the Bio-Seal Biopsy Track Plug
officialTitle: A Prospective Randomized Multi-Centered Study and Efficacy Evaluation of the Bio-Seal Biopsy Track Plug for Reducing Pneumothorax Rates Post Lung Biopsy Procedures
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate safety and effectiveness of the Bio-Seal Biopsy Track Plug in a clinical setting for use in lung biopsy procedures to reduce the rate of air leaks, commonly associated with the procedure. The Bio-Seal System is cleared in the U.S. with an indication for use as a lung biopsy site marker.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Absence of Pneumothoraces
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: X-Rays at 0-60 minutes, 24 hours and 30 days
